voice.text: Trust me with your money, I guarantee it will be safe.
Hey, send a letter to your friend now and then. Keep in touch, you know.
I am the postman and the banker around here!

parameter.value: I hope this new project lets Kazordoon prosper. Half of my family is involved in Farmine one way or another. If things turn out well, we will earn a hefty sum of money.
My only mission is to keep this little office running.
A weapon of pure power - or a weapon of pure imagination. Who knows?
Ah, my proud brothers and sisters. Only dwarfs could succeed with such an immense tunnelling project.
Now he is one-of-a-kind and a born leader.

If he only stopped bugging Ongulf about resources. We've already spent too much money on things that yield no immediate profit. ... But in the end, only profit will convince the imperial mining guild to continue their support.
It took my three weeks with almost no sleep to do all the paperwork for my business permission, but it was worth it! ... The guild is sticking to the old traditions and that is a good thing for sure.
Luckily we're far away from them.
Be greeted, noble |PLAYERNAME| and welcome to the post office.
Here. Don't forget that you need to buy a label too if you want to send a parcel. Always write the name of the {receiver} in the first line and the name of the {city} in the second line.
